text: 4.6 Jon 8.47, 10.27, 14.17, 1 Ko 14.37, 2 Ko 10.7 Chɨn pen God yɨl mɨdobun tek, binɨb God nop nepal okok, kɨli takaw apun ak nɨg dɨpal. Binɨb nop ma nepal okok pen, takaw apun ak ma nɨg dɨpal. Anɨb ak tek, God Kawnan ayɨp mɨdɨl takaw nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl won ak apal akaŋ, kawnan yokɨp gos ñek takaw yepɨs won ak apal ak nopun.
